1.0.1.name: wordpress/logo-candy
1.0.1.description: This plugin allows one to upload an image and replace the default one displayed on the WordPress log-in page. The plugin uses jQuery to replace the CSS on the log-in page. The link "name" and "description" are changed using two of the WordPress provided hooks.
